column4: (05:10:45 PM) and-ri: hello, how to disable the automatic opening windows if plug in an USB-stick?
in nautilus, go to edit --> preferences --> removable media... and uncheck the browse media when plugged check box.
thx, but my nautilus doesn't have such a entry. I solve it by using : settings->control Center->Peripherals->StorageMedia, chose Mounted Removable Medium and set 'do nothing' as AUTOACTION
ok. i think the actual path was Edit --> preference --> media --> browse meia when inserted...
